spring.controller

Class RESTFleetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.controller.RESTAbstractController<RESTFleet,Fleet>
      • spring.controller.RESTFleetController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value={"/${path.fleets}","/${path.companies}/{companyId}/${path.fleets}"})
public class RESTFleetController
extends RESTAbstractController<RESTFleet,Fleet>
    This controller is responsible for handling the HTTP requests of the URLs /fleets and /companies/{companyId}/fleets. Currently, the following HTTP requests are supported: 1) GET /fleet 2) GET /fleets/{id} 3) POST /fleets 4) PUT /fleets/{id} 5) DELETE /fleets/{id} 6) GET /companies/{companyId}/fleet 7) GET /companies/{companyId}/fleets/{id} 8) POST /companies/{companyId}/fleets 9) PUT /companies/{companyId}/fleets/{id} 10) DELETE /companies/{companyId}/fleets/{id} 11) POST /fleets/{id}/vehicles/import 12) GET /fleets/{id}/vehicles/import/example

    This controller is responsible for translating the RESTModels to the backend specific models and calling the appropriate methods of the spring independent controllers, located in the controller package. It is also responsible for translating the backend specific exceptions to HTPP repsonse codes.

    For more information about what the HTTP requests do, see the API specification

public java.util.Collection<RESTVehicle> importCSV(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")

                                                                                                        ObjectNotFoundException,
                                                                                                        InvalidCSVHeaderException,
                                                                                                        com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvException
        Import a CVS file of fleets
        Throws:
        ConstraintViolationException - The fields of a vehicle are not correct
        DataAccessException - Something went wrong with the database
        ObjectNotFoundException - There is no fleet with that id
        InvalidCSVHeaderException - The headers of the csv file are invalid
        com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvException - a vehicle in the csv file does have invalid data
        UnAuthorizedException
